definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Why is it mandatory that I find a plus sign?
Which is great, because now things work out, because this becomes a plus sign.
sentences.chinese: 很好因爲現在現在東西都出來了，這裏變成了正號。

sentences.english: He seems to have mistaken a plus for a minus.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎把正號誤當作負號了。
